name: [LD42] Human Powered Rocket
description:
*******If web version is laggy, you can try downloading windows version below *******

In the coming future, the population is growing fast and We need more Living Place!   
Therefore, our government started their SPACE Project which is using a **Human Powered launcher**.

Officer, you are assigned as this project's leader.
Just spend as much **"Man Power"** as you want!

****
**How To Play**    
Mouse for Aim and Left Click to send launcher     

  =>

  =>

  =>
    
Space to Push in the wall to fire your astronaut

****

IMPORTANT NOTES ↓↓

This is the indicator of Current Stress Level in the Cage ↑ ↑ ↑ ↑ ↑ ↑

More Human = More Stress

Once you Passed the red line, it shoots out the astronaut when you stop pressing Space
So try your best to

smash your Space Key as fast as you can and release it when you can’t hold the speed! 

(let the indicator go as high as it can before you stop)
